XXmatpra_u:1_0: sarvadā sarvathā sarve yasya doṣā na santi ha /
XXmatpra_u:2_0: tam eva śaraṇaṃ gantuṃ taṃ stotuṃ tam upāsitum /
XXmatpra_u:2_1: tasyaiva śāsane sthātuṃ nyāyyaṃ yady asti cetanā // 2
XXmatpra_u:3_0: savāsanāś ca te doṣā na santy ekasya tāyinaḥ /
XXmatpra_u:3_1: sarve sarvavidaḥ santi guṇās te cānapāyinaḥ // 3
XXmatpra_u:4_1: saha dharmeṇa labhate kaś cid bhagavato 'ntaram // 4
XXmatpra_u:8_1: yasya saṃkhyāprabhāvābhyāṃ na guṇeṣv asti niścayaḥ // 8
XXmatpra_u:9_0: iyanta iti nāsty anta īdṛśā iti kā kathā /
XXmatpra_u:9_1: puṇyā ity eva tu guṇān prati te mukharā vayam // 9
XXmatpra_u:10_1: svayam abhyupapannaṃ te nirākrandam idaṃ jagat // 10
XXmatpra_u:12_0: svamāṃsāny api dattāni vastuṣv anyeṣu kā kathā /
XXmatpra_u:12_1: prāṇair api tvayā sādho mānitaḥ praṇayī janaḥ // 12
XXmatpra_u:13_0: svaiḥ śarīraiḥ śarīrāṇi prāṇaiḥ prāṇāḥ śarīriṇām /
XXmatpra_u:17_0: parārthe tyajataḥ prāṇān yā prītir abhavat tava /
XXmatpra_u:17_1: na sā naṣṭopalabdheṣu prāṇeṣu prāṇināṃ bhavet // 17
XXmatpra_u:18_1: vadhakeṣv api sattveṣv kāruṇyam abhavat prabho // 18
XXmatpra_u:19_1: tvam eva vīra sārajño dūre tasyetaro janaḥ // 19
XXmatpra_u:20_0: nākṛtvā duṣkaraṃ karma durlabham labhyate padam /
XXmatpra_u:21_0: viśeṣotkarṣaniyamo na kadā cid abhūt tava /
XXmatpra_u:23_0: tvādṛśān pīḍayaty eva nānugṛhṇāti tat sukham /
XXmatpra_u:23_1: praṇītam api sadvṛtta yad asādhāraṇaṃ paraiḥ // 23
XXmatpra_u:24_0: vimiśrāt sāram ādattaṃ sarvaṃ pītam akalmaṣam /
XXmatpra_u:24_1: tvayā sūktaṃ duruktaṃ tu viṣavat parivarjitam // 24
XXmatpra_u:26_0: iti tribhir asaṃkhyeyair evam udyacchatā tvayā /
XXmatpra_u:27_1: agatvā sadṛśaiḥ spardhāṃ tvaṃ loke śreṣṭhatāṃ gataḥ // 27
XXmatpra_u:28_0: hetuṣv abhiniveśo 'bhūd guṇānāṃ na phaleṣu te /
XXmatpra_u:28_1: tena samyakpratipadā tvayi niṣṭhāṃ guṇā gatāḥ // 28
XXmatpra_u:29_0: tathātmā pracayaṃ nītas tvayā sucaritair yathā /
XXmatpra_u:29_3: guṇās tena sunītena parāṃ siddhiṃ tvam adhyagāḥ // 30
XXmatpra_u:31_0: tathā saṃbhṛtya saṃbhṛtya tvayātmany āhitā guṇāḥ /
XXmatpra_u:31_1: pratirūpakam apy eṣāṃ yathā nānyatra dṛśyate // 32
XXmatpra_u:33_1: anuttarāṇāṃ kā tarhi guṇānām upamāstu te // 34
XXmatpra_u:36_1: na ravir viṣaye bhūmiṃ khādyotīm api vindati // 37
XXmatpra_u:38_0: anena sarvaṃ vyākhyātaṃ yat kiṃ cit sādhu laukikam /
XXmatpra_u:39_0: yasyaiva dharmaratnasya prāptyā prāptas tvam agratām /
XXmatpra_u:39_1: tenaiva kevalaṃ sādho sāmyaṃ te tasya ca tvayā // 40
XXmatpra_u:41_0: pratanv iva hi paśyāmi dharmatām anucintayan /
XXmatpra_u:41_1: sarvaṃ cāvarjitaṃ māravijayaṃ prati te jagat // 42
XXmatpra_u:43_1: tasyām eva kṛtaṃ rātrau tad eva paramādbhutam // 44
XXmatpra_u:44_1: vīra vismayam āgacchet sa tīrthyavijaye tava // 45
XXmatpra_u:45_1: mūḍho vigatamohena tribhir nityaṃ jitās trayaḥ // 46
XXmatpra_u:46_1: anurodhavirodhau ca na staḥ sadasatos tava // 47
XXmatpra_u:47_1: yasya te cetaso 'nyatvaṃ tasya te kā stutir bhavet // 48
XXmatpra_u:48_0: guṇeṣv api na saṅgo 'bhūt tṛṣṇā na guṇavatsv api /
XXmatpra_u:49_1: mano nityaprasannaṃ te pratyakṣam iva dṛśyate // 50
XXmatpra_u:51_0: upaśāntaṃ ca kāntaṃ ca dīptam apratighāti ca /
XXmatpra_u:51_1: nibhṛtaṃ corjitaṃ cedaṃ rūpaṃ kam iva nākṣipet // 52
XXmatpra_u:52_0: yenāpi śataśo dṛṣṭaṃ yo 'pi tatpūrvam īkṣate /
XXmatpra_u:52_1: rūpaṃ prīṇāti te cakṣuḥ samaṃ tad ubhayor api // 53
XXmatpra_u:53_0: asecanakabhāvād dhi saumyabhāvāc ca te vapuḥ /
XXmatpra_u:53_1: darśane darśane prītiṃ vidadhāti navāṃ navām // 54
XXmatpra_u:55_0: kvānyatra suniviṣṭāḥ syur ime tāthāgatā guṇāḥ /
XXmatpra_u:56_0: dhanyam asmīti te rūpaṃ vadatīvāśritān guṇān /
XXmatpra_u:56_1: sunikṣiptā vayam iti pratyāhur iva tad guṇāḥ // 57
XXmatpra_u:57_0: sarvam evāviśeṣeṇa kleśair baddham idaṃ jagat /
XXmatpra_u:58_0: kaṃ nu prathamato vande tvāṃ mahākaruṇām uta /
XXmatpra_u:58_1: yayaivam api doṣajñas tvaṃ saṃsāre dhṛtaś ciram // 59
XXmatpra_u:59_1: kālā labdhaprasarayā tat te karuṇayā kṛtam // 60
XXmatpra_u:60_0: śāntād araṇyād grāmāntaṃ tvaṃ hi nāga iva hradāt /
XXmatpra_u:61_2: ṛddhir yā siṃhanādā ye svaguṇodbhāvanāś ca yāḥ /
XXmatpra_u:63_0: tathā hi kṛtvā śatadhā dhīrā balim iva kva cit /
XXmatpra_u:64_1: tathā hi bādhamānāpi tvāṃ satī nāparādhyate // 66
XXmatpra_u:66_0: kasya na syād upaśrutya vākyāny evaṃvidhāni te /
XXmatpra_u:67_0: prāyeṇa madhuraṃ sarvam agatyā kiṃ cid anyathā /
XXmatpra_u:67_1: vākyaṃ tavārthasiddhyā tu sarvam eva subhāṣitam // 69
XXmatpra_u:68_0: yac chlakṣṇaṃ yac ca paruṣaṃ yad vā tadubhayānvitam /
XXmatpra_u:68_1: sarvam evaikarasatāṃ vimarde yāti te vacaḥ // 70
XXmatpra_u:69_1: yair idaṃ vākyaratnānām īdṛśaṃ bhājanaṃ kṛtam // 71
XXmatpra_u:70_1: mukhāt kṣarati te vākyaṃ candrād dravam ivāmṛtam // 72
XXmatpra_u:72_3: gamakaṃ suprayuktatvāt trikalyāṇaṃ hi te vacaḥ // 75
XXmatpra_u:73_0: manāṃsi tāvac chrotṝṇāṃ haranty ādau vacāṃsi te /
XXmatpra_u:73_1: tato vimṛśyamānāni rajāṃsi ca tamāṃsi ca // 76
XXmatpra_u:74_1: saṃvejanaṃ ca sukhināṃ yogavāhi vacas tava // 77
XXmatpra_u:75_1: timiraghnaṃ ca mandānāṃ sārvajanyam idaṃ vacaḥ // 78
XXmatpra_u:77_1: avandhyaṃ tena sarvatra sarvaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ tava // 80
XXmatpra_u:78_0: yan nādeśe na cākāle naivāpātre pravartase /
XXmatpra_u:78_1: vīryaṃ samyag ivārabdhaṃ tenāmoghaṃ vacas tava // 81
XXmatpra_u:80_1: mataṃ yadi vigarhanti nāsti dṛṣṭisamo ripuḥ // 83
XXmatpra_u:81_0: anvabhuṅkthā yad asyārthe jagato vyasanaṃ bahu /
XXmatpra_u:81_1: tat saṃsmṛtya virūpe 'pi stheyaṃ te śāsane bhavet // 84
XXmatpra_u:82_0: prāg eva hitakartuś ca hitavaktuś ca śāsanam /
XXmatpra_u:82_1: kathaṃ na nāma kāryaṃ syād ādīptaśirasāpi te // 85
XXmatpra_u:86_1: prayāti tatra tu svairī yatra mṛtyor agocaraḥ // 89
XXmatpra_u:88_1: śāsanaṃ nādriyante yat kiṃ vaiśasataraṃ tataḥ // 91
XXmatpra_u:90_0: prasūtir harṣayati te vṛddhir nandayati prajāḥ /
XXmatpra_u:94_0: tvam oghair uhyamānānāṃ dvīpas trāṇaṃ kṣatātmanām /
XXmatpra_u:101_0: viruddheṣv api vātsalyaṃ pravṛttiḥ patiteṣv api /
XXmatpra_u:101_1: raudreṣv api kṛpālutvaṃ kā nāmeyaṃ tavāryatā // 105
XXmatpra_u:106_1: tvayā hi bhagavan dharmasarvātithyam idam kṛtam // 110
XXmatpra_u:107_1: upāsate prāñjalayaḥ śrāvakān api te surāḥ // 111
XXmatpra_u:109_1: dvaṃdvāny ākīrṇatā ceti doṣān guṇavad udvahan // 113
XXmatpra_u:111_0: kadannāny api bhuktāni kva cit kṣud adhivāsitā /
XXmatpra_u:111_1: panthāno viṣamāḥ kṣuṇṇāḥ suptaṃ gokaṇṭakeṣv api // 115
XXmatpra_u:113_0: prabhutvam api te nātha sadā nātmani vidyate /
XXmatpra_u:113_1: vaktavya iva sarvair hi svairaṃ svārthe niyujyase // 117
XXmatpra_u:114_0: yena kena cid eva tvaṃ yatra tatra yathā tathā /
XXmatpra_u:117_1: tatrābhūd abhisaṃyānaṃ sadayaṃ sāmṛtaṃ ca te // 121
XXmatpra_u:118_0: ākroṣṭāro jitāḥ kṣāntyā drugdhāḥ svastyayanena ca /
XXmatpra_u:120_0: yat sauratyaṃ gatās tīkṣṇāḥ kadaryāś ca vadānyatām /
XXmatpra_u:121_1: kṣamitvaṃ cāṅgulīmāle kaṃ na vismayam ānayet // 125
XXmatpra_u:122_1: aśerata sukhaṃ dhīrās tṛptā dharmarasasya te // 126
XXmatpra_u:123_0: pṛṣṭenāpi kva cin noktam upetyāpi kathā kṛtā /
XXmatpra_u:124_1: tato dharmo gatamale vastre raṅga ivārpitaḥ // 128
XXmatpra_u:124_2: na so 'sty upāyaḥ śaktir vā yena na vyāyataṃ tava /
XXmatpra_u:126_1: sarvāṇy eva nṛdevānāṃ hitāni mahitāni ca // 131
XXmatpra_u:127_0: na hi vaktuṃ ca kartuṃ ca bahu sādhu ca śakyate /
XXmatpra_u:128_1: yasmān naivaṃvidhaṃ kṣetraṃ triṣu lokeṣe vidyate // 133
XXmatpra_u:129_1: hitāya sarvasattvānāṃ yas tvam evaṃ samudyataḥ // 134
XXmatpra_u:130_0: na tāṃ pratipadaṃ vedmi syād yayāpacitis tava /
XXmatpra_u:130_1: api ye parinirvānti te 'pi te nānṛṇā janāḥ // 135
XXmatpra_u:131_0: tava te 'vasthitā dharme svārtham eva tu kurvate /
XXmatpra_u:131_1: yaḥ śramas tannimittaṃ tu tava kā tasya niṣkṛtiḥ // 136
XXmatpra_u:132_0: tvaṃ hi jāgarṣi suptānāṃ saṃtānāny avalokayan /
XXmatpra_u:134_1: karaṇīyaṃ bhaved yatra na dattānunayo bhavān // 139
XXmatpra_u:135_0: yadi saṃcāriṇo dharmāḥ syur ime niyataṃ tvayā /
XXmatpra_u:136_1: iti tvam uktavān bhūtaṃ jagat saṃjñapayann iva // 141
XXmatpra_u:138_1: ṛṇaśeṣaṃ kim adyāpi sattveṣu yad abhūt tava // 143
XXmatpra_u:140_0: parārthāv eva me dharmarūpakāyāv iti tvayā /
XXmatpra_u:141_0: tathā hi satsu saṃkrāmya dharmakāyam aśeṣataḥ /
XXmatpra_u:142_0: aho sthitir aho vṛttam aho rūpam aho guṇāḥ /
XXmatpra_u:142_1: na nāma buddhadharmāṇām asti kiṃ cid anadbhutam // 147
XXmatpra_u:143_1: tvayy api pratihanyante paśya mohasya raudratām // 148
XXmatpra_u:144_1: ye tvāṃ sattvā namasyanti tebhyo 'pi sukṛtaṃ namaḥ // 149
XXmatpra_u:145_0: akṣayās te guṇā nātha śaktis tu kṣayiṇī mama /
XXmatpra_u:146_1: svayam evātmanātmānaṃ tvam eva jñātum arhasi // 151
XXmatpra_u:147_1: parā ca nas tuṣṭir avasthitā hṛdi /
